description:
At Withered Burns, LLP, we are determined to help our clients achieve legal results that matter. We assist individuals, families and business professionals in Lafayette, Indiana and throughout the surrounding Tippecanoe County area in personal injury, wrongful death, car accidents, workers' compensation, business, real estate, wills, trusts, and estate planning.

Our Lafayette law firm is led by AV Preeminent peer review rated* managing attorneys Jerome L. Withered and Eric H. Burns, along with Patrick I. Jones. Lawyers Zachary T. Williams and Elliott McKinnis round out our team of experienced and effective legal professionals.

With a focus on providing vigorous representation to our clients, we represent those who have been seriously injured in car accidents and workplace accidents, and offer strategic legal advice and advocacy in a comprehensive range of legal matters. Our diverse legal services allow us to help our clients in many areas of their lives.

You can expect to receive friendly, responsive service when you contact Withered Burns, LLP, regarding your injuries or other legal matters. We will work with you to understand your situation and explain your legal options that you are able to make smart, informed decisions about your case.

Withered Burns, LLP, is one block south of the Tippecanoe County Courthouse, on the corner of Third and South streets in downtown Lafayette. For more information, please call us at 765-637-7984.

*AV Preeminent is a certification mark of Reed Elsevier Properties Inc., used in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the confidential opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell ratings fall into two categories: legal ability and general ethical standards.
